name: Chaos Bolt
Description: Roll damage type randomly:  1         Acid 2         Cold 3         Fire 4         Bludgeoning 5         Lightning 6         Poison 7         Psychic 8         Thunder
Circumstances: If a critical is rolled, the spell leaps to another creature within Range and attacks them, if it is a crit it can attack another, etc,  but each creature may only be attacked once
